faqs.question: What is smart water management?
faqs.answer: Smart water management involves using IoT and AI to optimize water usage and prevent wastage.

faqs.question: Do your products detect leaks?
faqs.answer: Yes, all our products are equipped with real-time leak detection capabilities.

faqs.question: Can I integrate your solutions with my existing system?
faqs.answer: Yes, our systems are designed to integrate seamlessly with existing infrastructure.

faqs.question: Is it suitable for outdoor environments?
faqs.answer: Yes, it is designed for harsh environmental conditions with IP68 waterproofing..

faqs.question: How does it connect to the IoT dashboard?
faqs.answer: Via GSM, Wi-Fi, or Bluetooth, depending on the model.

faqs.question: What is the maintenance schedule?
faqs.answer: Minimal maintenance required, with recommendations for bi-annual calibration checks.
